mapper.insert: insert into message (id, phone, location, province, city, create_time, last_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{phone,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, phone, location, province, city, create_time, last_time from message
